other_tests.findings: Stenting has been successfully placed in the right lower lobe.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Dyspnea has improved significantly since stenting.

other_tests.findings: No focal lesions in the pancreas; new fat stranding surrounding the pancreas and fluid tracking along the left anterior pararenal space. Multiple metastatic lesions in the liver increased in size compared to a prior study.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Stable size of the right hilar mass, unchanged pulmonary nodules. Increased size of splenic metastasis and an enlarged lymph node in the left lower quadrant.
